sentences.english: Characterization of newly synthesized collagen and proteoglycan was performed.
sentences.chinese: 对新合成的胶原和蛋白多糖进行特征性描述。

sentences.english: This article will summarize the relationship between the markers of cartilage collagens and osteoarthritis.
sentences.chinese: 本文对软骨胶原标志物与骨性关节炎的关系作一综述。

sentences.english: They also help the body break down collagen in skin production.
sentences.chinese: 他们还有助于分解肌肤新陈代谢中产生的胶原质。

sentences.english: Objective To explore changes of micro framework of the collagen fibers of the epiphyseal plate following traction separation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨骺板受到牵拉后其胶原纤维超微构筑的变化。

sentences.english: The word "collagen" is derived from kolla, the Greek word for glue.
sentences.chinese: 单词“胶原蛋白”是从科拉所得，对胶希腊字。

sentences.english: Porcine oocytes were separated by method of collagenase and the antigen of zona pellucida was prepared by heating.
sentences.chinese: 胶原酶法分离猪卵巢卵子，热溶解制备透明带抗原。

sentences.english: As the matter of fact, collagen cannot be added to the skin topically.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，胶原蛋白不能局部地添加到皮肤中。

sentences.english: Electron microscope showed there were myofilament and collagenous fibril in the cell plasm.
sentences.chinese: 电镜可见胞浆内含肌丝及胶原原纤维。

sentences.english: Collagen (type IV in basement membrane and types V and VI as fine fibrils ) comprises the structural component of ECM that provides shape and stability.
sentences.chinese: 胶原是细胞外基质的结构性成份，维持形状和稳定性。

sentences.english: Collagen is the main ingredient of skin corium 72%.
sentences.chinese: 胶原蛋白是人体皮肤真皮层中的主要成分，占72%。

sentences.english: The collagens are the most important components of extracellular matrix.
sentences.chinese: 胶原蛋白系细胞外基质中最主要的成分。

sentences.english: Microscopically, the fibrous pleural plaque is composed of dense layers of collagen.
sentences.chinese: 镜下纤维性胸膜斑由数层致密的胶原纤维组成。

sentences.english: The immunizing conjugation product of collagenase in this program was prepared by EDCI method.
sentences.chinese: 冷冻干燥法制备注射用胶原蛋白酶免疫结合物。

sentences.english: Is a professional production and sales of collagen casing manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 是一家专业生产销售胶原蛋白肠衣的厂家。

sentences.english: Collagen fiber is one kind of animal fiber.
sentences.chinese: 胶原纤维是一种动物纤维。
主营胶原蛋白肠衣产品。

definition: polypeptide, chain of amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH, a component of protein
stratum corneum (outermost layer of the skin)
peptide (two or more amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH)
keratin (protein forming nails and feathers etc)
